title: Drawing and caricature with typography.
content:
Dear colleagues and friends, I put to consideration of you a Project that I carry out with my students of Diseño Gráfico. It has been good me to compete internationally.

I begin with Paddy Boehm, an excellent colleague and friend German caricaturist. I wait their appreciations and comments.

A hug,  
Vidal

P.D.: A thousand excuses, my English is regular. I help myself with the translator.
